4304940.name: Welcome To Mars 9 Demo
4304940.description:
"Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River" is an old school graphic adventure game about a space castaway who finds themselves rescued by a luxurious space station orbiting Mars. As the main character, River, you'll be thrust into a world of comfort and pleasure, but soon discover that the station is hiding a dark secret.

In "Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River", you will need to navigate your way through the station's elaborate leisure facilities, using your wits to navigate through the station and solve puzzles. As the game progresses, you'll begin to uncover the station's sinister side and must decide whether to turn a blind eye or take action.

The choices you make in "Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River" will defy your ethics and challenge your moral compass. Will you do what it takes to protect yourself and ensure your own survival or will you risk everything to expose the truth and put an end to what is happening in the station?

The game's pixel art creates a stunning and immersive world that captures the essence of classic adventure games. From the luxurious facilities to the dark corners of the station, every location in "Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River" is full of character, waiting to be explored. The compelling storyline of the game will keep you on the edge of your seat. With multiple endings to discover, "Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River" is a game that you'll want to play again.

Are you ready to embark on a journey of self-discovery and uncover the dark secrets of the space station orbiting Mars?
4304940.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
